page.title: 01THE BURTON AND NEYLAND AREA
page.content: Our area is in{Pembrokeshire}near the estuary of the{River Cleddau.}It is split in two by the river;on the north (which is by far the biggest area) is farmland apart from the small town of{Neyland . }On the south side there are some disused oil tanks and an old army barracks that have been turned into offices. { Neyland}has just had a new boom in its tourist attractions for a new { {Marina}has just been built on Westfield Pill. Not many people work in{Burton}and{ {Burton Ferry }but they go into nearby towns.Many of the men work in the{Oil {Refineries}at{Milford Haven. We think that the people in our area are contented with their life style and dont want it changed.
